title: loadbanger
description: The `loadbanger` (or `lb`) object in Pure Data sends "bang" messages when a patch is loaded, when it receives any message, or when clicked. It supports different modes for sending bangs: a default "load" mode, an "init" mode (using the `-init` flag) which sends bangs earlier for dynamic patching, and a "finalize" mode (using the `-fin` flag) for actions after patch loading. The number of outputs can be configured by an argument.
